entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Tom' by Hepzibah.

entities.name: hepzibah
entities.description: A house-elf who is showing Harry a mysterious cup.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as 'Tom'.

entities.name: house-elf
entities.description: A type of magical being that is bound to serve a family or individual.

entities.name: cup
entities.description: A small golden cup with two finely wrought handles.

relationships.description: Hepzibah is showing Harry a mysterious cup.
Voldemort has a greedy expression when he sees the cup, suggesting that it belongs to him.
